attributes.action:
Parliament, review and reform
Make it fit for purpose, a platform of the people
attributes.additional_details: Over the past 3 years the country and parliament has become divided, however, parliament has become an institution where the people who sit in representatives seats are there for their own will and not for the good of the electorate. This is the case for all sides and all parties. Parliament needs to be reformed and get back to being a fit for purpose institution of the people of United Kingdom. It need to become a vehicle for decision making and policy setting for the good of the electorate.
attributes.background: Parliament has become a place for career politicians to impart their own will and not the will of the people. Parliament is no longer representative of the people of the UK. We need to have a parliament that will act on behalf of all UK people’s interest in a considered and respectful approach.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like reforms made to Parliament, but we aren't sure exactly what reforms you'd like to see put in place. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
